1.content: You`re in a haze. Your vision begins to clear and you realize you`re not where you were before you passed out, or was it fell asleep? Your memory is still a little hazy, but you still remember your name is ________, and that you`re a big anime fan, especially of One Piece. Your vision finally clears and you realize you`re now in the world of One Piece! After celebrating for a few minutes, you realize where you are in this world. You are...

What can you do? Then you hear a voice, and your vision goes black. The voice keeps repeating one phrase over and over. It sounds like the name of a devil fruit, and it keeps saying...

1111.content: The renkin renkin no mi, or alchemy alchemy fruit in English. You realize you now can use alchemy in the same manner as the alchemists in Full Metal Alchemist. With your new powers, you can now fight back. You`ll worry how you got Devil fruit powers later. So how will you fight against the marines?
1111.title: ...Renkin renkin no mi. (Alchemy alchemy fruit.)

choices: Introduce yourself and hope nothing bad happens.
11111.content: Let`s wreak some havoc! You aim an alchemy circle down at the sand below you can catapult yourself towards the marine ship. After creating a stand for yourself on the side of the marine ship, you use an incomplete alchemy circle to punch a hole in the side of the marine ship you`re on. You jump on top of the ship and the marines on board point their guns at you. Slyly, you then create another alchemy circle at your feet and shoot yourself to the next marine ship as the Marines you just left behind are yelling, "S/He`s a fruit user, get the sea-stone cuffs!" After a little while of repeating this process, you decide this will take too long as more marine ships are coming. So to stop them all in one swift blow, you create the biggest alchemy circle you can and separate the sea around them into it`s base elements and cause it to dissipate, running the ships aground. As the water you didn`t touch flows back in, you catapult yourself again onto the Thousand Sunny. After the marines surface and curse at you, you realize you`ll probably be labeled a pirate for this, but then again, you never really cared in the first place. As you turn around to the crew, they all look at you in astonishment. Now what?
11111.title: Use you alchemy circles to do some real damage.

You suddenly realize you have a heavy gold chain as a belt, and you could use that to make a weapon like a whip or a spear.
You also have you MP3 player and headphones in you pocket, and with a little creativity, you could make a sonic blaster. Wait, you got to keep your MP3 player and headphones, which is considered advanced technology in this world, but will probably be of no use in battle or in this world at all, but you can`t keep your important memories? Weak.

So which is it?

1112.content: The sure sure (pronounced Su-ray su-ray) no mi, or thread thread fruit in English. You realize you now can create threads from any part of your body and the threads are as strong as steel. You also have complete control of the thread you create at any time, connected to your body or not, as long as you stay within a certain radius, but the threads still maintain their strength. With your new powers, you can now fight back. You`ll worry how you got Devil fruit powers later. So how will you fight against the marines?
1112.title: ...Sure Sure no mi. (Thread thread fruit.)

choices: Introduce yourself and hope nothing bad happens.
11122.content: You decide to use your new powers to play around with the marines a little. You see two palm trees close together and using two strands of thread, create a slingshot and shoot yourself towards the marine ships. Realizing you`re not quite going to make the distance, you create a glider out of thread and glide towards the marine ships. As you get closer, you draw back your glider, dive in, and make a pair of claws. You hit the sails and rip them to shreds. The marines point their guns at you and you create a barrier of thread and block the shots. The Marines start yelling, "S/He`s a fruit user, get the sea-stone cuffs!" To stop them, you shoot out a thread net and pin them all to the deck. Then it hits you, you still need to deal with the other ships. So you make an anchor point in the ship you`re on and start jumping from ship to ship, wrapping the thread around the ships. When you`re done, it looks like the fleet got caught in a messed-up version of cat`s cradle, each ship having it`s crew pinned to the deck. You send a line to the Thousand Sunny, and slide right over. When you land, the Mugiwara Kaizoku look about halfway between amazed and scared. Now what?
11122.title: Use your powers to play around a little.

11131.content: So, you jump, and to your surprise you jump about 50 feet in the air, without even trying! You jump again trying to go even higher, when you realize your body feels lighter and stronger than it did before you started this whole crazy adventure. At your peak you see how high you`ve jumped, and feel a little scared and hope it doesn`t hurt when you fall down and close your eyes. A few seconds later, you realize you aren`t getting that falling sensation and opening your eyes, you realize you haven` t moved at all. You`re FLYING!!! One brief analysis later, and you realize that you can use your Ki like in Dragon Ball. So, how to proceed...

11132.content: So, you run to the other side of the island, in about five seconds, and you can tell you were not even running at full speed! You start running again trying to go even faster, when you realize your body feels lighter and stronger than it did before you started this whole crazy adventure. You see the beach and run in the direction of the Thousand Sunny and the Marine fleet, and a split second later, you realize you probably can`t run across water, but your legs keep going so you close your eyes. A few seconds later, you realize you aren`t getting that sinking feeling and you aren`t wet. So you open your eyes, and you realize you haven` t sank. You`re RUNNING ACROSS THE WATER!!! A new voice says in your head, "the fastest thing alive". Remembering that was one of the things Sonic would say, you guess you have super speed somehow. So with your new knowledge of your abilities, how will you fight?
11132.title: Run like your life depended on it.

124.content:
Totally abandonned. The sails were tattered. Blood soaked into the wooden deck, and the captains wheel spun lifelessly on its own.

You were on a ghostship.

You creeped around the fair sized ship. Guessing at one point it must have held about 40 to fifty people given it's size. Edgeing around every corner out of caution and a fear instilled from countless horror movies. Finding only moldy half eaten food and broken weapons littered about. From the lack of life boats around the place and the life liquid leading over the rails you'd guess this was abandonned a while ago.

You head to the captains quarters. Hoping to find some clue as to wear you are or where these pirates (tattered roger up above) were going. The cabin had a clean bed, a wardrobe full of undamaged (if musty) cloths, a desk covered in maps. It was fortunate that you knew the one piece uiverse otherwise this would be lost to you.

You sigh in relief as you realise your in the east blue. The least dangerous sea.

While you were contemplating you heard a 'thunk'. Whipping your head around you realise its from that old treasure xhest at the foot of the bed. Opening it your eyes widen as you find....
124.title: ...someone else. You decide.

1241.content:
you open the large, old chest and see devil fruit, lots of them. then you spot a book that had the jolly roger drawn to it. you stared at the jolly roger on it and realized that it look scary, it looked like a monster's face or possibly loooked like the calling card of the devil himself. you shake your head and say that a drawing can't hurt you. then you open the book and see that it is a book of devil fruits, each one having a drawing and it's name one the pages. sadly it doesn't tell exactly what it does, apparently because no one has eaten any of the fruit. you put the book back and close the chest. you just got to find some kind of information about this ship and what happened to them, you didn't even see a corpse around here. you figure since you were in the captains room you'll find a logbook of some kind in here. and you find it on a desk, a black book with LOG BOOK sewed on to it. you read it from begining to the last entry. the captain's name was Richard Flane, it said that he had 53 crewmates on his ship, as for his demise it said in the last entry, "our log pose broke ever since we crossed the red line and have now entered some sort of cursed sea, many of my men have been taken by some bird like creature and some kind of giant squid. i only hope that is the last we hear of the monsters but i fear that it will happen again as we are still sailing the nightmarish waters. i promise that if we ever get out of these waters that i will-" and then it ends there. but then how did it get to the east blue?

you hear a terrible noise and realize that you haven't eaten in many hours. but everything is moldy and rotten. the only thing you can think of eating is the devil fruit, but you can't eat all of them. you remeber from watching one piece that if eat more than one of them that you will die. and also that when eat one you will never be able to swim.

Sumi sumi no Mi, or Ink ink fruit in English. Now you remember that this devil fruit allows the user to produce an unlimited amount of ink and write with it anywhere, but it must be in kanji. Good thing you understand Japanese. You can also seal kanji by writing it down on paper along with the kanji for seal, and writing the kanji for release anytime later, and the effect happens. You snap back to reality and realize you could make a weapon, or create an effect to distract/attack them.

1323211.content:
" Thanks mister, but I was about to dogde them and send these Marines flying " said Luffy.
( Note: You are 30 years old in this story ) " I don't think so kid. Besides, I also appear to have a bone to pick with the Marines ( althought I don't remeber why??? ) so this is also my business " you said.
The Marine Sargeant encharged with the capture of Luffy pulls out a list of Wanted people, and in the middle he stops and looks at one of the pictures : " I knew I'd recognise this face, this guy is " __________, the Lone Wolf " a swordsman pirate who made a name by himself by assaulting Marines Bases. He has a bounty of 40 million berris"
You suddenly start to have flashbacks of everything that we must have been through in your life as a pirate. The images of Marine officers opressing several villagers from different islands and the beatdown taken from a swordsman. And you're dream: OF CHALLENGING AND DEFEATING THE WORLD GOVERNMENT (sorry, it just seemed like a reasonable dream).

The Marines start shooting while you're distracted. When you wake up from you're day dream, Luffy appears to have jumped towards the bullets preventing them from hitting you. " Looks like were even " said Luffy. " Heh " you laughed " funny kid ".

Two minutes later, you resheated you're sword and Luffy dusted his shorts next to a pile of beatendown Marines.

I'm on a mission, so you buy their help
13232111.content:
( this is post-Thriller Bark, so yes, I'm gonna crap my pants when meeting Brook, LOL )

You and Luffy are taking a shortcut through a small town. Where?... you don't know since Luffy is the one guiding you.
" So tell me, kid, where are you taking me? "
" To my ship, so my nakama can meet you " answered Luffy. Suddenly his stomach growled and he turned to you " I'm hungry, and the ship is still halfway. You mind if I speed up our walk? "
" Sure, no problem " you answer , thinking that he means running, when suddenly you flashback about Luffy's meaning of going faster.
" Gomu Gomu No ............. Bazooka "
" Oh, shit ! "
The last thing you remember is Luffy pullinh you with one arm in mid-air and dragging in the air in a 5 km voyage that ended with you slamming against the ground. You wake up one minute later with Luffy at your right trying to get his head unstuck from a hole on the ground. You look up and see a beautiful ship, adorned with a tremendous head figure.
" It trully is a beautiful sunflower " you remarked, only to be hit in the head by a flying hammer, followed by the words "IT'S NOT A SUNFLOWER, BAKA!!!"

You wake up, again, in the Thousand's Sunny infarmary. You look to your side and see the figures of Chopper's back, apparently making something on his desk and Nami, scolding Franky for the incident,
" You know I hate when people do that " replied the cyborg.
" But it has no excuse concerning people who have never seen it " scolded Nami
" Hemm.... hello? " you said while getting up.
The sudden salute made Chopper jump from his chair and hide himself (the wrong way, again) behind Nami's legs.
" I'm sorry for the trouble, are you feeling alright now? " asked Nami walking towards you, while at the same time, stepping on Franky's foot.
" OWW! " yelled Franky, holding his foot, until he took the hint " Oh, ya. Sorry about the hammer thingy. I kinda snapped back there".
" No really, it's my fault. I should have realized that it was really a sun " you replied
" WHAT? " yelled Franky towards you in an angry mood.
" Kidding, it is a marvelous ... lion " you concluded, putting an end to Franky's rage.
" Of course it is. It was made in the most SUPER way I could " said Franky, proud of himself.
" Yeah, yeah! " replied Nami, sick of the cyborg's talking about himself " come now. You should meet the rest of the crew, they're outside waiting for you to recover " stated Nami while pushing the shipwright outside.
" Yeah, you should meet the crew " said Chopper near your legs.
" Tanuki ?" you joked
" Reindeer, you asshole! See ? Antlers !!! " answered Chopper furious
" Heh! I know, just kidding. And thanks for patching me up. You're an awesome doctor. "
" You bastard, that doesn't make me happy at all " said Chopper doing his happy dance.

When you walked outside, all Straw Hat Pirates are present in the lawn.
You jump the rail and land in front of them, bowing with one knee on the floor.
" My dear pirate comrades. It's polite for the guest to be the one to introduce himself. I'm .... "
" Yes, we already know who you are. We read the wanted picture the Marines posted around town " said Robin, shocking you with surprise, loose your balance, and falling face first on the ground.
" It's also polite to let a person finish his own introduction " you said, still face in the ground. " I also know of you all. You're quite famous around Water 7 " you said, remembering a stroll you had made in that place " but I don't recal the existence of such a character " you said, standing up, pointing at Brook.
After being introduced to Brook, which you find hilarious and interesting about being a swordsmen also, you and Nami sit down on a table on the lawn, discussing the terms about your staying on their ship.
13232111.title: Luffy takes you to the Thousand Sunny

1323221.title: Yes.

You split up and meet with Luffy or another Strawhat Pirate later.
13232221.content: You just noticed you have a large, cloth-wrapped object tied to your back using part of the cloth. As they fire, you quickly unwrap it and use it as a shield to deflect the bullets. You`re surprised you could lift and swing a sword this size that quickly. The Marines begin to reload and you decide to do something. On reflex, you swing your large sword at high speed and on impulse, you say, "Surasshu no Kuuki Funsai!! (Air-Shattering Slash!!)" The Marines are disabled in an instant with their commander looking in awe for a second before calling for backup. You look at your sword for a second and notice your blade looks like a mixture of Inuyasha`s Tessaiga and Cloud`s Buster Sword, but with an English sword-style point. Then more Marine come after you and Luffy, and you both say, "Run for it!!!" You both bolt off in the same direction. Now what?
13232221.title: A Giant Sword. (How did you not notice it?)

choices: It says nothing and you wake up.
13233.content: You try to listen again, but this time you hear the sound of guns cocking and aligning. That voice better say something quickly!
13233.title: ...I`m sorry. I fell asleep, Please say that ag...

132331.content: It says nothing and you wake up! The marine officer, being one of the cruel ones, yells "FIRE!!" You can only look as the Marines pull their triggers, and gunshots are heard. So what happens?
132331.title: It says nothing and you wake up.

1323311.content:
Just then you realize that, to you the bullets are moving slow enough to see, but still relatively fast. As is on cue, you reflexively catch each bullet in mid-air, not moving one step from you original spot. As you catch the last bullet, the Marine firing squad just stare at you and wonder how they all missed their shots. Then you drop the caught bullets with a smirk on your face, and the Marines and bystanders all yell in shock, "WTF!?!?!?!"
Luffy just yells, "AWESOME!!!"
You wonder what else you can do when you hear, "Second Firing Squad, line up!" As the Marines change formation, you decide to...
1323311.title: A miracle happens.

choices: Inu inu no mi model heruhaundo (dog dog fruit model hellhound)

choices: Trying to remember where the boat was docked

I think we all know who`s next...

choices: You`re wearing a marine uniform. But why?
You`re in a Marine prison cell for some reason.
You`re in a storeroom, sneaking around. Are you a thief?
You`re in a Marine training facilty.
Some other reason you guys get to create.
14.content: Well, where did you end up in a Marine base? Are you in a Marine uniform, or are you sneaking around for some reason?
14.title: ...in a marine base.

choices: Another marine runs up and recognises you. Your a real marine. Crap!
Another marine runs up and doesn't recognise. you. Phew your not a real marine
141.content:
A freaking marine uniform!?!

Oh you hope that your just sneaking about a base for some pirate related buisness, it would piss you off if you found out your a marine.
141.title: You`re wearing a marine uniform. But why?

choices: You are a commanding ranked marine
You are a solider ranked marine
You are a marine in training
1411.content: As the marine runs up to you he calls to you by rank
1411.title: Another marine runs up and recognises you. Your...

choices: go to the devil fruit holding room and steal one.
1413.content: Luffy is locked in a seastone cell wrapped in knots around a log.
1413.title: breaking out

14133.content:
Which devil fruit do you steal to eat?

Mizu-Mizu Fruit. User can turn him/herself into water to fiight with but if they fall in the sea, it has same effects as any other fruit.

Kongouseki-kongouseki Fruit: The ability to manipulate the substance of diamond and change any part of the body into a weapon. Also able to spawn a sword made of diamond.
14133.title: go to the devil fruit holding room and steal one.

141331.content:
You always hear about the awful taste of devil fruit, but you always wanted to try one so you took the Mizu-Mizu fruit and ate it, and sure it was awful. After you swallowed the last fruit you felt more powerful within as if Poseidon was on your side.

“Let’s see..Mizu bomb!” You spoke

With that you hand summoned a blue sphere water bomb! You threw it and it exploded! You were now acquired a new power.

Just then..
141331.title: water world

choices: No, you run towards the jail
Yes, you run into a squad of 15 recruit marines
141332.content:
Looking at the two choices which are in front of you, you decide upon the diamond fruit. It seems to be the best fruit in order to help mugiwara luffy to escape.

Remembering that some Devils Fruit are fated to taste disgusting you try to take a bite and swallow......and boy were the rumours right. It was the worst tasting fruit ever, but it was worth it. You could feel a new hardness (Pun) to your identity.

Deciding to test it out, out of the bloom you yell "Kongouseki-kongouseki no Bougyo" (Diamond Defense). Suddenly your body starts to change and you notice, you skin is now made of diamond. You cry out in joy but then realise it's time to help mugiwara luffy to escape.

Do you run into any problems?
141332.title: Kongouseki-kongouseki fruit (Diamond fruit)

choices: Chase them, you can't let them escape
1413322.content:
Walking back to where luffy was held prisoner, you seem to not realise you are not taking precautions....this is a marine base for gods sake. You run down the last hallway and realise you have ran into a squad of 15 marine recruits.

Not hesistating you shout "kongouseki-kongouseki no Itsutu supaiku" (Five Spikes). This releases five diamond spikes from your body springing towards the recruits, they yell in surprise to what is happening to them. The spikes hit five of the marines dead on, however the rest of the squad retreats.

Do you chase after them, or do you go to free mugiwara luffy?
1413322.title: Yes, you run into a squad of 15 recruit marines

14133222.content:
You think to yourself 'Forget them, it'll be better for two of us to escape anyway'.

You run towards where luffy was been held and you grow a sword of diamond out of your arm, out of consciousness. You look at the sword and again at the sea stone jail cell and slash the sword onto the bar.

SLICE!!!!

The bars fall apart and you step into the cell.

"AWESOME, who are you?" Luffy yells towards you as you cut off the sea stone chain. 'Luckily i can grow a sword', you thought, 'that sea stone would have weakened me considerably if i couldn't'.

"My name Dan, I woke up in this marine base for some reason, lets get out of here". Running out the of jail itself you encounter.....
14133222.title: free luffy

choices: You, Luffy and Bon Clay go on as Buggy and Mister 3 escape
141332222.content:
Running out of the cell you start to raise your sword as you see the marines approaching you.

Suddenly......

GUMO GUMO NO BAZOOKA.....

This wipes out nearly everyone in front of you, where as you pick off the survivors of this attack. Looking around you figure it's tme to ask luffy what he's doing here. "Hey, Luffy, what is this place and why are you here?", you see his face drop and realise something bad has happened, what is it?

"Ace...... I've got to save Ace. This is Impel Down". You look in awe as you realise where you are. How could you have directed this place without being caught. That's right you had the uniform. Hmmmmm.

"Well let's get going, where's he at?" you ask.

"Hancock said he'd be on the lowest level, we have to find him, he's going to be executed....."

"After you.." you reply, somewhat weakly.

Luffy runs off in a certain direction and you accompany him, he yells back 'this is level 3 we need to go lower'. You nod in reply to this and keep going, he was also talking about his friends getting caught, you knew who they were and if you noticed them you'd help them out. Looking in the cells as you pass you hear a noise.

"Mugiwara-san" a cheerful voice sounds out. "You're ok" A man steps forward accompanied by two other. They are none other than Bon Clay, Mister 3 and Buggy.

Luffy asks you to free them, so with that you swing the mighty diamond sword and slash the sea stone bars to oblivion. They step out in awe at what you did. Luffy chimes out, "Everyone this is Dan he free'd me. He's helping to free Ace too. Hurry we'eve only got 16 hours...."
141332222.title: A squadron of marines

1413322221.content:
Buggy and Mister three have already took off and left you in the hallway with bon clay and luffy. You seem to noticed the tenseness in the hall and decide to plow on ahead. It seems a bit too easy going through the prison corridoors, but you start to think that the marines may still believe luffy is locked up, or they are carefully planning something ahead (most likely since some got away earlier).

You keep heading forward and come to a staircase which leads you down, down to level four-Blazing hell...
1413322221.title: You, Luffy and Bon Clay go on as Buggy and Mist...

14133222212.content:
The skip takes away the major battles between magellan and the poison luffy suffered to the point where bon clay and yourself are helping to keep the wolves away from luffy.

Suddenly the wolves un expectedly attack bon clay, which takes a lot out of him causing him to faint. You chase the wovles away with five spikes and your sword. However you needto protect them for other reasons.

You create a dome of diamond much alike that of mister 3 and his wax dome. This covers luffy and bon clay. You call up diamond defense and sit to wait for the right time to move. Without realising it, you drift away....

When you wake up you're in a bed, with a nice warm cover over you. You look to your side and see bon clay but where's luffy. After waking bbon clay, you walk along the corridoor to find a light at the end of the tunnel. You walk through and....
14133222212.title: skip to new kama land....

142.content:
You look around only to see that the room only has one way in and out and the guard, well he's sitting in a chair, sleeping.
You start to wonder why your in the cell in the first place you walk towards the front of the cell to the door noticing the lock is weak (meaning you could break it)
142.title: You`re in a Marine prison cell for some reason.

choices: You`re on Alabasta, in the capital.
You`re on Skypeia, high in the sky.
You`re on the Shabondy Archipellago, slave or not?
You`re on Amazon Lily. If you`re a guy, you`re in trouble.
Somewhere else that could be exciting or helpful.
15.content: Alright, you`re on and island the Mugiwara Kaizoku have already been to. So, where are you?
15.title: ...somewhere else.

choices: A guy. You`re in deep now.
A girl. You`re safer, but not totally safe yet.
154.content: So which gender are you? Don`t worry, I won`t ask often.
154.title: You`re on Amazon Lily. If you`re a guy, you`re ...

choices: Thriller Bark the zombie filled island/ship owned by Gecko Moria
155.content: how about one of these?
155.title: Somewhere else !!

choices: Being a low down pirate, who's out of luck and beli.
1552.content: That right,you just floating along in the ocean of the one piece world. But what are doing here? You can't remember a thing. "How did i get here?" You asked yourself, as the sun shine down on you. You rather wet,but that's because you in the sea,but as the waves slowly drift you along. You remember something else. Something about...
1552.title: Floating and wondering

15521.content:
Oh that's right. You ate a devil fruit. But wait devil fruit user can't. Suddenly you find yourself struggling to swing and your nice floating has now turned into a fast sinking motion.

"Ah, no I can't swim." You think as you struggle to try and swim. You thrash about in the water trying to swim up, but no luck. Seeing you had no chance you began to sink again. It all seemed over for you. "I don't even know who I am, why would this happen to me?" You think as your body becomes heavy. You close your eyes and slowly the world becomes dark.

But hope is not over for you feel someone grabbing you and swimming up to the surface. Your open your eyes and find yourself on a small fishing boat with a rather scruffy fisherman looking down at you. "Ah you awake" he says with a cheerful tone. He helps you up and you stand up, feeling rather lucky you escaped death.

As you stand there, the fisherman scratches his head. “i know who you are." He says with a grin. "You’re...
15521.title: Devil fruit user

choices: Acutally i have no idea who you are.
155212.content: "No..hold on your.." The fisherman says trying hard to work out who you are.
155212.title: More choices.

15531.content:
As you wake up you notice how cold it is and feel the wind whipping around your body. Then you begin to think, "so cold..... Am I Dead?" Your eyes close and you pass out. Unbeknownst to you the earth below you was approaching rapidly.









Are you male or female?
15531.title: Im Free Free Fall'in....

155311.content: Are you a devil fruit user or do you have some other skill?
155311.title: Male

choices: Kinzoku Kinzoku No Mi (Metal Metal Fruit) Logia type
1553111.content: which fruit do you have?
1553111.title: Devil fruit

15531111.content:
Wreck Cove island.
Grand Line.

Lisana was tired these slave merchants had been chasing her for a couple of hours."Why do mermaids have to be worth so much to these greedy bastards, she thought. Slave merchants had been selling women like her to greedy humans for a long time unfortunately this was the reason she was without a family. When she was only 16 slave merchants came for her mother and any other mermaid they could sell. She had her mother taken from her that day and her father was killed in the attempt to save her mother. She pushed her black hair back and looked around. At age thirty she didn't look much older than twenty-two. She sat down on a rock, her D-cup chest heaving, naturally athletic but having run for three hours straight without rest or water was a bit much even for her. "Well I think I lost them." she said breathing heavily. Leaning back trying to loosen the sore muscles in her back she saw a shooting star. "Please send someone capable of protecting us merfolk in my hometown have been disappearing and others have been leaving saying that our little island is cursed. We need help." Suddenly from behind two pairs of hands grabbed her. She screamed and felt a rough hand over her mouth. "We've got her!", one man said, "Well don't injure her otherwise we wont get as much." said the other man. Lisana felt the hand covering her mouth partially lose it's grip. She took her chance and bit down hard. "Yeow, Fuck boss she bit me!", said the first man. "Well that is why you put a damm gag on the prisoner." said the second man who clearly was in charge.
15531111.title: Metal Man

155311111.content: You wake back up to warmth still feeling groggy you look forward and see a clearing in a forest and the ground coming up at you rapidly. Instinctively you curl into a ball and brace for impact. The last things you hear before you pass out again were the word help and a young woman's scream.
155311111.title: Awakening.

1553111111.content: Lisana looked up at the sky and saw that the shooting star form earlier was getting closer. All of the sudden the air filled with a rumbling and the immediate area grew bright then the star crashed. Lisana was thrown backward into a tree the wind knocked out of her the two men who were holding onto her were thrown back further into the trees. Lisana stood up and surveyed the furrow in the soil that the thing had created upon impact and followed it. At the end of the furrow she saw someone sprawled out. "Hey are you alright?",Lisana called out. They didn't respond. As she got closer she saw it was a young man maybe eighteen or twenty years old. She hopped down into the furrow. " I hope he's all right.", she thought. She placed her fingers on his neck and felt a faint but steady pulse. she breathed a sigh of relief. "Well well well what have we here." said the boss. "Dunno boss but I bet he will fetch a good price." said the lackey. Lisana turned and stood in front of the comatose boy. "You are not taking him, he's just a kid." she said. "Shut it you self righteous bitch!" the boss said as he struck Lisana, she cried out in pain.
1553111111.title: Making an impact.

15531111111.content: Your eyes start to open and your dizzy brain immediately begin to process the situation you are in. The young woman who was looking at you a moment ago had stood up arms at her sides with her hands balled into fists. Her summer dress billowing to the left. "you are not taking him, he's just a kid!" She said. After that all you heard was the tall man calling this girl a bitch and her cry of pain as she was struck sideways. In that instant you were on one knee and pissed.
15531111111.title: Your begining

155311111111.content:
The slave merchants see you stand up and charge you ram your fists into their stomachs and the collapse spewing blood. You then collapse all of the adrenaline out of your system.

Lisana decides it would not be a good idea to leave you with them helps you stagger to her home where you promptly pass out on her couch.
155311111111.title: Heated Heart

1553111111111.content:
You wake up sore and wondering where you are and if that girl from last night is okay. Then as you were thinking about her she walked into the room. "Where am i and who are you?" you asked. My name is Lisana And you are in my house, Thank you for helping me last night." She said. "So who are you and where are you from?" She asked. "I-I don't know Where I'm from" You replied. "What about your name, do you remember you name?" She asked.


" Yes, my name is................................"
1553111111111.title: Lisana's House

15531111111111.content: "Well then Kyle what do you plan to do now, do you know anywhere you could stay?" Lisana asked. "I don't know." you reply still exausted from the night before. "If you really need somewhere to stay, you can use my guest room its the least I can do to repay you for helping me last night." Lisana responded kindly. "Thanks." you say stifling a yawn. Lisana seeing how tired you are shows you to the guest room and before another word is exchanged you have fallen asleep.
15531111111111.title: Kyle

155311111111111.content:
You stand on a cliff looking over the water. The sun is rising it has been three months since you had crashed on Wreck Cove Island and met Lisana who to your surprise is a mermaid. She spends most of her time on land since gaining the ability to walk on land upon turning thirty. Lisana's voice shocks you out of your thoughts. "Kyle, breakfast!" you look back at her small house that you have been sharing with her for the past three months. You see Lisana standing at the door in a pale orange sundress and start in her direction. When you reach the door you stop and look back at the sea. " Good morning, the sea is calm today. Did you sleep well?" you said. " Yes Kyle." with her reply she tousles your messy brown hair. "Hey come on you know I don't enjoy that" you say pulling back and smiling. "I cant help it after you've been here so long you are like my kid brother." She said with a small laugh.


After breakfast the two of you head into town so Lisana could do the necessary shopping and you came to carry anything that is too heavy or bulky for her to hold.

Do you meet someone there or is your trip uneventful?
155311111111111.title: Three months later

1553111111111112.content: After your trip you and Lisana arrive back home and set every thing down in her small kitchen. "Lisana I'm going out for a bit." you said. "Okay but be back by dinner." Lisana replied. You walk out the door and start down the lane. Where do you go?
1553111111111112.title: you dont meet anybody interesting.

15531111111111121.content: You head down the lane and make a left turn towards the beach over the past couple of months you had become good friends with the village elder's granddaughter Tiana. Being the only human on the island is rough at first the younger men being fishmen saw you as inferior to them. Tiana however was more accepting and a bit lonely herself living with her grandparents after her parents were killed by pirates. Her red hair was easy to spot at a distance. "Hey Tiana!" you called out. "Kyle Its good to see you." she said turning her emerald colored eyes towards you. The two of you being the same age liked each others company though you had feelings that you weren't sure how to express to her. you sat down on the sand right by the water with Tiana and spoke about how things had been going for the two of you. soon the sun began to set and you headed back home for dinner and to go to bed.
15531111111111121.title: The beach (Reserved)

choices: Ressha Ressha no mi (liner liner fruit)
15531112.title: other

155311121.content: From whos prov do you want?
155311121.title: Ressha Ressha no mi (liner liner fruit)

1553111211.content:
As your vision returns to you, your mind begins to fill with information, models and understanding.

The Resha Resha Fruit....the power to call upon and the knowledge to pilot the trains that traverse the world on the wings of adventure, tracks of imagination and legacy of those before them. Doing so, however, takes a big strain on the user for calling them out on a special ride. However, the knowledge to pilot them can be shared with others.

You figure that one of the Straw Hats can pilot the Resha, so you square up. Calling a Resha requires you to focus on that Resha in your mind and think about it hard, in all it's detail.You also need to think about who will pilot the Resha.

Which Straw Hat will it be? Your mind imedently goes to Luffy, but maybe he's not the best choice......
1553111211.title: The Straw Hats

15531112112.content: .....maybe Luffy isn't the best choice. You mind immediately then thinks of Zoro. The moss-haired, three sword wielding former bounty hunter turned pirate.....would he be a good choice?
15531112112.title: Another one.

choices: Luffy asked if I could join him
1553111212.content: Calling Drill Ressha! (Calling Drill Ressha please wait until it comes to a complete stop!!!) After getting on board I drove the Drill Ressha into the Marine ships making them explode and sink into the sea when I stop the Ressha by the Sunny everyone even the cool headed Robin had their mouths on the deck amazed at what I did and than...
1553111212.title: yours

15531112211.content: This is what he looks like http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-o6LP9lk3BIs/UG...
15531112211.title: Tyranno

155311122121.content: This is what he looks like http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/abar...
155311122121.title: Kera

info.brief_description: It`s time for you to jump in the story of One Piece! Who will you become?
info.description:
You wake up in the World of One Piece, and your adventure will start there. Prove yourself to show you have what it takes to fit the role you have chosen.

Rules:
Bloodshed is allowed.
Romance is allowed.
Keep sex to a minimum. This is One Piece after all.
Any references are fine by me as long as you don`t say anything to the characters about where it came from.
Have fun with it!

I will add to this story to help get you guys started and to keep it moving, but I will leave some spaces open for you guys.
